highlights_en: 17% of tourism businesses has been permanently shut down during the pandemic.
highlights_ne: १७% पर्यटन व्यवसाय हरू स्थायी रूपमा बन्द भएका छन्।

highlights_en: 66% of the businesses layed off more than three quarters of employees.
highlights_ne: ६६% व्यवसायीहरूले तीन चौथाइभन्दा बढी कर्मचारीहरूलाई छुट्टयाए।

highlights_en: 63% of businesses had their revenue stopped completely.
highlights_ne: ६३% व्यापारीहरूको राजस्व पूर्ण रुपमा रोकिएको थियो ।

highlights_en: More than 95% businesses has implemented some sort of health and sanitation measures.
highlights_ne: ९५% भन्दा बढी व्यवसायीहरुले कुनै न कुनै प्रकारको स्वास्थ्य तथा सरसफाईका उपायहरु लागू गरेका छन् ।

highlights_en: More than 95% businesses has implemented some sort of safety measures for workers.
highlights_ne: ९५% भन्दा बढी व्यवसायीहरूले कामदारहरूका लागि कुनै न कुनै प्रकारको सुरक्षा उपायहरू लागू गरेका छन्।

highlights_en: 70% businesses believe that they will have difficulty in covering the operating costs in the next six months.
highlights_ne: ७०% व्यवसायीले आगामी छ महिनामा सञ्चालन खर्च व्यहोर्ने काममा कठिनाइ हुने विश्वास गरेका छन् ।

highlights_en: 54% of businesses were not aware about the  government schemes.
44% of businesses believe that compared to 2019 revenue generation will be negligible as an effect of Covid-19.
highlights_ne: ४४% व्यवसायीहरूको विचारमा सन् २०१९ को राजस्व उत्पादनको तुलनामा कोभिड-१९ का कारण नगण्य हुनेछ।

highlights_en: 34% of businesses anticipate that workforce size will be less than three quarters of the size compared to 2019.
highlights_ne: ३४% व्यवसायीहरूले सन् २०१९ को तुलनामा कर्मचारीको साइज तीन चौथाई भन्दा कम हुने अनुमान गरेका छन्।

highlights_en: 71% of businesses assume that winning the confidence of tourists and guests would be the major challenge even after businesses resume.
highlights_ne: ७१% व्यवसायीले पुनः व्यवसाय सन्चालन भएपछि पनि पर्यटक र पाहुनाको विश्वास जित्नु नै प्रमुख चुनौती हुने अनुमान गरेका छन् ।
